title: Happy Birthday, Shioriko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Eh….? Everyone has gathered here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah, that’s right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Not just Nijigaku members, but everyone from μ’s and Aqours too….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, yeah. That’s why we should hurry…. Oh, my? Shioriko? What’s the matter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I-, I’m sorry. I was so surprised that I couldn’t react…. To have all 28 members gathered here for me…. I haven’t had this many people attending my birthday since kindergarten. Ah, the kindergarten one was a collective birthday celebration for everyone that has their birthday in October, though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Puh…. Fufufu. They’re always like this, you know. Sometimes they’ll surprise you, but you’ll slowly get used to it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, forgive me. It may be rude of me to say that I was surprised. Umm, it’s that my heart feels heavy, and I don’t know what to say….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I know. You should tell everyone that gathered here that feeling. I’m sure everyone will be happy to hear it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I will! Thank you too, Eli-san. For coming to get me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I won the right to pick you up from rock-paper-scissors, Shioriko. Whoever won will be the one to congratulate you first, so I couldn’t afford to lose. Happy birthday, Shioriko. Let’s enjoy the party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
